DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether PED-1 effective Placebo treatment premature ejaculation .
DOC.brief_title: Trial PED-1 Male Patients With Premature Ejaculation
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate whether PED-1 effective Placebo treatment premature ejaculation . The patient randomize allocated two treatment group placebo , PED-1 . The criterion Intravaginal Ejaculation Latency Time ( IELT ) enrollment > =2 min least 75 % sexual intercourse . To diagnosis premature ejaculation , PEDT ( Premature Ejaculation Diagnosis Tool ) use . The patient undergone drug free baseline period take test drug 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Informed consent subject partner Men 2065 age Stable monogamous relation least 6 mo Premature Ejaculation Diagnosis Tool ( PEDT ) 9 At least 6 mo premature ejaculation Hx IELT = < 2 min > = 75 % evaluable event 4 week screening period History medical psychiatric illness Erectile dysfunction ( < 21 International Index Erectile FunctionErectile Function ( IIEFEF ) domain score ) form sexual dysfunction Partner sexual dysfunction Known hypersensitivity clomipramine contraindication clomipramine
